name: All Or Nothing
value: You take a -a penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit

name: Armor Smash
value: Your attack deals damage to your armor.

name: Attack The Darkness
value: All your enemies have concealment from you for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

name: Awkward Attack
value: You take a [[-2]] penalty to AC for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

name: Backswing
value: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

name: Bad Grip
value: Your weapon deals nonlethal damage for the next [[3]] rounds.

name: Bent
value: You take a [[-4]] penalty on all attacks with this weapon until it is repaired (DC 20 Craft check).

name: Better To Give
value: Your attack damages you instead. Use your target's STR modifier.

name: Bohemian Earspoon
value: You are deafened until healed (DC 15 Heal check).

name: Bonk
value: You are stunned for [[1]] round (Fort negates).

name: Broken Blade
value: Your weapon is destroyed (Ref negates). Magic weapons use their own save bonus.

name: Broken Haft
value: Your weapon loses reach. You have a [[-4]] penalty on attack rolls with it until repaired (DC 20 Craft check).

name: Butterfingers
value: You drop your weapon.

name: Catastrophic Failure
value: You fall unconscious for [[/r 1d6]] rounds (Will negates).

name: Catch Your Breath
value: You can only take a move action next round.

name: Critical Mistake
value: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

name: Cutter
value: You take [[1]] point of STR bleed.

name: Eat Dirt
value: You fall prone and are blinded for [[/r 1d3]] rounds (Fort negates).

name: Fling
value: You drop your weapon and it lands [[/r 1d6]] squares away in a random direction.

name: Fog Of War
value: You threaten no squares for [[/r 1d6]] rounds.

name: Funny Bone
value: You drop whatever is in your off hand.

name: Go For The Eyes
value: You are blinded for [[1]] round.

name: Hand It Over
value: Your target gains possession of your weapon (Ref negates).

name: I Told You It Was Sharp
value: You take [[/r 1d6]] points of bleed.

name: No Way
value: Your attack hits the target, but deals minimum damage.

name: Off Balance
value: You can only take a move action next round.

name: On The Receiving End
value: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

name: Overextend
value: You provoke an attack of opportunity from all adjacent opponents.

name: Parry! Dodge! Spin! Thrust!
value: You are dazed for [[1]] round.

name: Pin Prick
value: You take [[1]] point of bleed.

name: Pulled Muscle
value: You take [[/r 1d4]] points of STR damage.

name: Punt
value: Your weapon flies [[/r 2d6]] squares in a @RollTable[q6lsEqmsqZWShTIV]{Random Direction}.

name: Second Thoughts
value: You are sickened for [[/r 1d6]] rounds.

name: Shield Crash
value: Your attack deals damage to your shield.

name: Slipped
value: You are knocked prone.

name: Sorry
value: Your attack hits an ally adjacent to you or the target.

name: Spinning Swing
value: You are sickend for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

name: Strain
value: You take [[/r 1d4]] points of DEX damage.

name: Stuck
value: Your weapon is stuck in a nearby surface. DC 20 STR check to free it.

name: Surrounded By Foes
value: Your attack hits an ally within reach and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

name: This Is Bad
value: You take an amount of bleed equal to your STR bonus (minimum 1).

name: Too Much Stuff!
value: You become entangled in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself.

name: Vibration
value: If you're using a bludgeoning weapon, you take [[/r 1d3]] points of STR damage and drop your weapon.

name: Wait! What?
value: You are confused for [[1]] round.

name: Winded
value: You are exhausted (Fort negates).

name: Who Was That?
value: You are dazed for [[/r 1d3]] rounds.

name: Wrong End
value: If you're using a slashing weapon, you take [[/r 1d6]] points of damage and [[1]] point of bleed.

name: You Meant To Do That
value: Move 10 feet in a random direction and provoke attacks of opportunity as normal.
